name: Roommates (itch) (KaMiKaZa)
description:
Your relatives moving to your one-room apartment! They already moving their stuff, but there is no room for all of you. Outsurvive your roommates by maneuvering around falling furniture!

Controls

ActionButtonsMoveWASDPush someoneWASD in the direction of other characterSkip the turnSpaceClose the gameEsc

Key mechanics

The game is turn-based, and mainly consists of three phases:

  • Preview of the falling furniture;
  • Actions;
  • Furniture fall.

Each character is capable of doing two actions per turn. Impossible actions are marked with "X" and doesn't consume the action point. Player can skip the turn and stay in place, but doing so will waste all remaining action points.

The level have four window tiles at the top. Any character can move or be pushed into it for an instant dropout.

Character can push only one other character by one action.

Player always have a green sprite, "enemy" sprites are randomized.

Player has the lowest "initiative", so player's turn is always the latest one during the "character action" phase.

Goal

The goal is to be the last man standing.
